document_data.caption: Map showing Vaerluth
document_data.name: Vaerluth
document_data.mainbody: '''Vaerluth''' was the easternmost [[goblin]] realm in the [[Rauvin Mountains]] in [[Luruar]].
document_data.Geography: Vaerluth was located in the caverns and foothills of the eastern Rauvin Mountains.
document_data.Government: Vaerluth was ruled by a succession of kings named Vaerluth; in [[1372 DR]], the realm was on its 36th King Vaerluth. Succession of each king came through the murder of his predecessor.
document_data.Inhabitants: The goblins of Vaerluth were considered the poorest of the goblins in the Rauvin Mountains. They dwelt in huge-spider-infested caverns and foothills, which gave them immunity to the spider venom. The goblins boiled the spider webs to make soup.
